Title: III Smoking Barrels
Writer: Tasadduk Ahmed (dialogue), Sanjib Dey, Dev Gupta (dialogue)
Actors: Subrat Dutta, Indraneil Sengupta, Mandakini Goswami, Amrita Chattopadhyay
Plot: An anthology of three stories; each exploring a different stage in life - A CHILD involved in armed conflicts, a BOY in drug peddling and a MAN entangled in elephant poaching.
